plugins.name: code-quality-plugin
plugins.description: Code quality review skill focusing on DRY, KISS, and Clean Code principles
plugins.author: devstefancho
features: Request code review or quality assessment
Ask for feedback on code changes
Question code complexity or readability
Review pull requests or commits
Request refactoring suggestions

plugins.author: Code Style Team

plugins.name: common-mcp-plugin
plugins.description: Common MCP servers for shared tools and integrations (chrome-devtools, etc)
plugins.author: Claude Plugins Team

plugins.name: git-commit-plugin
plugins.description: Auto-generate conventional commit messages in Korean by analyzing changes
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
features: Smart Analysis - Analyzes staged/unstaged changes automatically
Scope Detection - Determines appropriate commit type (feat, fix, chore, etc.)
Korean Messages - Generates commit messages in Korean
User Confirmation - Asks for approval before committing
Security Checks - Warns about sensitive information in commits

plugins.name: git-worktree-plugin
plugins.description: Manage git worktrees for parallel branch work. Proactively suggests worktree creation when working on PRs or new features
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
features: Easy Creation - Creates worktrees with proper branch naming conventions
Cleanup Management - Lists and removes worktrees safely

plugins.name: pr-create-plugin
plugins.description: Create GitHub pull requests with auto-generated title and description based on branch changes
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
features: Smart Analysis - Analyzes all commits since branching from main
Auto Title - Generates concise PR title from changes
Structured Body - Creates summary and test plan sections
Push & Create - Pushes branch and creates PR in one command

plugins.name: scaffold-claude-feature
plugins.description: Generate Claude Code features (slash commands, skills, subagents, hooks, output styles) with proper structure and best practices
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
features: Slash Commands - Reusable prompts
Skills - Model-invoked capabilities
Subagents - Specialized AI agents
Hooks - Event handlers
Output Styles - Custom system prompts

plugins.name: session-reporter-plugin
plugins.description: Generate HTML reports to visualize work sessions including conversation history, code changes, and execution results
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
features: Session Visualization - View conversation history, code changes, and execution results
Flexible Scope - Export last activity only or entire session
Auto-open - HTML file opens automatically in your browser
Clean Formatting - Syntax highlighting and section navigation

plugins.name: simple-sdd-plugin
plugins.description: Simple SDD (Software Specification & Design) workflow commands for generating specifications, plans, tasks, and implementations
plugins.author: Stefan Cho

plugins.name: spec-manager-plugin
plugins.description: Manage specification files for spec-driven development workflow with feat, fix, docs, refactor, and chore scopes
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
features: Structured Specs - Organize specs in specs/{scope}/{work-name}.md
Scope Support - feat, fix, docs, refactor, chore
XML Tag Format - Consistent structure for each scope type
Duplicate Detection - Checks for similar existing specs

plugins.name: stop-notification-plugin
plugins.description: macOS notification when Claude finishes working
plugins.author: Stefan Cho
